text_a: A man and a woman are walking through the city of KathmandU, looking to buy some goods in an unfamiliar area, when they are approached by a woman who says that she has been waiting here for a man she has just met. The man she is waiting for is Ivan, a young man who has been walking the streets for days. They speak for a while in a friendly manner, until a man named Nita appears.
text_b: And then everything went back to the way it had been, with Ivan and all the others walking around in their normal, ordinary lives. That was when Nita told Ivan about the end of all things.
label: next-scene
